title.a: CONTAINED #Avenue60Fire Greater Alarm Brush Fire 07/01/2022 INC#1649

item.description: CONTAINED #Avenue60Fire Greater Alarm Brush Fire; INC#1649; 11:08PM; 368 S Av 60; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R8JgWi; Highland Park; A total of 96 LAFD firefighters stopped forward progress at just under 5 acres in one hour and 17 minutes. Firefighters will remain on scene for an extended period of time to improve containment lines and ensure remaining hot spots and smoldering debris is fully extinguished. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation. ; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E17 E2 E21 E212 E233 E235 E29 E290 E3 E42 E47 E55 E56 E66 E90 EA1 EM11 EM13 H1 H2 H4 H5 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA5 HT1 RA12 RA3 RA56 RA844 T12 T33 T35 T90 WT88; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update #Avenue60Fire Greater Alarm Brush Fire 07/01/2022 INC#1649

item.description: Update #Avenue60Fire Greater Alarm Brush Fire; INC#1649; 11:00PM; 368 S Av 60; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R8JgWi; #HighlandPark; Ninety-six LAFD firefighters (along with mutual aid from two LA County FD hand crews) continue to attack the fire by ground and air. The fire is burning uphill in steep terrain, but thankfully in very light wind conditions. Firefighter are assigned structure protection in a nearby neighborhood as a precaution. As air support continues to make water drops on the fire, ground crews are making their way around both flanks with hose lines and hand tools.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E17 E2 E21 E212 E233 E235 E29 E290 E3 E42 E47 E55 E56 E66 E90 EA1 EM11 EM13 H1 H2 H4 H5 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA5 HT1 RA12 RA3 RA56 RA844 T12 T33 T35 T90 WT88; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 07/01/2022 INC#1504

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1504; 08:46PM; 2659 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OE34Pz; #LincolnHeights; **Updated Address** It took 59 firefighters 25 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames consuming the first and second levels of a 2,236 sq-ft two-story vacant craftsman-style home built in 1950. One firefighter sustained a non-life-threatening injury and was transported to a local hospital in fair condition. No other injuries. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC14 BC2 CM22 E1 E12 E2 E201 E202 E203 E212 E226 E288 E44 E47 E89 EM1 RA1 RA12 RA801 T1 T12 T2 T26 T3 T88 UR3 UR89; CH7; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1504; 08:21PM; 2651 N Pasadena Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OE34Pz; #LincolnHeights; Two-story craftsman home with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E12 E201 E212 E44 RA1 RA801 T1 T12; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Update Test Only; INC#0001; 12:00AM; 12345 W Astoria St; Fairfax; Please disregard previous incident alert #0001, as we are doing testing and maintenance on our alerting system today. Thank you.; Nicholas Prange

Train vs Vehicle; INC#1076; 03:27PM; 1199 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RbDhzY; #ExpositionPark; An Expo Line train collided with one vehicle. Driver is out of the vehicle (no extrication needs). Firefighters/paramedics searched the train for any possible patients. No medical complaints found. Thankfully, no hospital transports needed (including driver of vehicle). LAPD Inc #2759. Nothing further. ; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 BC13 E13 E14 E210 E215 E226 E34 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA835 SQ21 T10 T15 T26; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0431; 08:40AM; 646 N Sierra Bonita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OTsR6a; #Fairfax; 40 Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a tree fire that had extended into a one-story detached garage on LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E41 E52 E82 RA27 RA52 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire Knockdown - 06/28/2022 INC#1736

item.description: Update Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1736; 10:11PM; 10412 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u9vdpr; #VermontVista; Address Corrected from W 104th Pl to 10412 S Figueroa St. 72 LAFD Firefighters took just 33 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire on two floors of a two story apartment building. Three civilians (unknown age / gender / condition / affiliation / circumstances) have been taken by LAFD ambulance to an area hospital. No firefighter injuries. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC4 CM22 E205 E21 E215 E221 E233 E264 E5 E57 E64 E65 E66 EM13 HR3 RA264 RA266 RA33 RA66 RA864 SQ21 T15 T21 T33 T5 T64 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 14 17; Brian Humphrey
